cleaner.label: Deep Scan - More
cleaner.description: Scans the complete disk for files

option.label: All .tmp files
option.warning: Deletes all .tmp files on your system! Use on your own risk! Inspect the preview for any files you want to keep. This option is slow.

option.label: All .log files
option.warning: Deletes all .log files on your system! Use on your own risk! Inspect the preview for any files you want to keep. This option is slow.

option.label: All .old files
option.warning: Deletes all .old files on your system! Use on your own risk! Inspect the preview for any files you want to keep. This option is slow.
